mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_id, p.prd_name, q.title, q.created_at, CASE WHEN q.answer IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS status FROM qna q JOIN PRODUCT p ON q.product_id = p.product_id WHERE q.product_id = #{product_id} AND q.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY q.created_at DESC
SELECT q.*, u.name AS user_name FROM qna q JOIN USER_TABLE u ON q.user_id = u.user_id WHERE q.qna_id = #{qna_id}

SELECT q.qna_id, p.prd_name, q.title, q.created_at, CASE WHEN q.answer IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS status FROM qna q JOIN product p ON q.product_id = p.product_id WHERE q.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY q.created_at DESC
